_header: A holy man beyond the sea / Was bishop of a great city
_description: The Knight who did penance among worms, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
A holy man be ȝond þe seWas byschop in Agrett
                    cuntre…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…þer he ys now in play & gamynIhesu bryng vs
                    þeder all same

BodAsh42.First Lines:
A hali man beȝonde þe CeeWas bisschope of a grete
                    cytee…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…In hye heuene wiþ gammen & playeGod bringe vs
                    þidir als he wele maye

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
AN holy mon bi ȝonde þe seeWas Bisschop of a gret
                    Citee…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þere hit woneþ wiþ pley and gameGod bryng vs
                    þider al in same. AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Hou a knyt dude his penaunce among wormes (f. 176vc)
